body_html:
It is documented here - https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/exponential-backoff

I see it being used in a few places -

tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_allocator_retry_test.cc
tensorflow/core/platform/profile_utils/cpu_utils.cc
